channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on Tasdiqul Islam
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on Tasdiqul Islam

item.title: Adaptive Entanglement Generation for Quantum Routing
item.description: A deep reinforcement learning framework for fast and scalable entanglement generation in quantum networks.

item.title: Proactive Entanglement Swapping for Quantum Networks
item.description: A reinforcement learning framework that proactively performs entanglement swapping to improve throughput and reduce routing overhead in quantum networks.

item.title: QuRA: Reinforcement Learning–Based Routing for Quantum Networks
item.description: A deep reinforcement learning–based routing framework that enables scalable, fidelity-aware quantum routing under dynamic traffic.
